relics.name: Blood Diamonds
relics.description: When you lose HP, gain 9 gold for each lost.
relics.flavorText: Sparkly little rocks from totally honest sources!

relics.name: Goldloader
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain 70 gold.
Your mod list is quite average.
relics.flavorText: Mods = $$$

relics.name: Houseplant
relics.description: Every three turns, gain energy and draw a card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Did you know, Slaytabase has a secret crush on a pokemon called...

relics.name: Snecko's Second Eye
relics.description:
At the start of combat, become bundlecore:Heavily_Confused.
When you play a card, discard a random card, draw a card and apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Even more confusing than the first!

relics.name: Strength
relics.description: When you Exhaust Ascender's Bane, gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: May your power bring rage.

relics.name: Support Cannon
relics.description: At the start of turn 3, deal 26 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Includes a free wraith to load and fire!

relics.name: Architect's Gizmo Pack
relics.description:
Obtaining a Curse, gives 1 Max HP.
When you draw a Status card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
When you play a Power gain 1 Thorns.
When you play an Attack gain 1 Block.
When you play a Skill, gain 1 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: Contains a variety of handy tools for every situation.

relics.name: Dragonkin's Hex
relics.description: When you deal unblocked Attack damage, reduce the targets Strength by 1 for one turn.
relics.flavorText: An almighty curse that deprives the enemy of their power for quite some time.

relics.name: Fixed Oar
relics.description: From turn 4, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Now you can really go on an adventure!

relics.name: Infinite Contract
relics.description: When you climb a floor, gain 5 gold and increase this by 1. Spending gold resets and inverts this effect Permanently.
relics.flavorText: *Slaps Paper* This contract can fit so much scam in it!

relics.name: Minty Munch
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 3 Max HP.
At the end of your turn, draw 1 next turn for each Status card in hand and Exhaust them.
relics.flavorText: Has a very distinct taste and is surprisingly edible. Wait thats not what i...

relics.name: Big Boulder
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, gain [E].
At the end of your turn take 1 damage and increase the damage by 1 this combat.
relics.flavorText: Your sheer hubris commands you to lift this boulder even though its sheer weight causes great pain.

relics.name: Clockwork Crown
relics.description: Has an upside per turn determined by bundlecore:Day and downside upon pickup determined by bundlecore:Hour.
relics.flavorText: It might be time to consider this relic...

relics.name: Crown of Kingdoms
relics.description:
On pickup, obtain 3 Ascender's Bane and one random relic from ALL tiers.
If you are not the Defect, obtain 1 upgraded Dualcast.
relics.flavorText: With my regal right, i command you to bring me wealth!

relics.name: Dry Wither Skull
relics.description: When you play a Skill card, enemies lose HP equal to the turn count.
relics.flavorText: It all turns to dust...

relics.name: Exclamation Card
relics.description:
Permanently upgrade ALL cards EVERYWHERE.
Future card rewards contain 2 less cards.
relics.flavorText: CARD!?

relics.name: Fast Fennec Friend
relics.description:
Upon pickup, lose up to 24 Max HP (Up to 50% of your Max HP).
At the start of combat gain 2 bundlecore:After_Image.
Lose [E] at the start of your turn and draw 1 card per enemy.
relics.flavorText: :Fox: + :Fox: = 3(:Fox:)

relics.name: Faster Clock
relics.description:
At the start of your your turn, gain [E].
Your turns end automatically after a set amount of time, which is the sum of 5 plus your number of Potion slots, maximum energy and half of your cards in deck.
relics.flavorText: Its time to pick up the pace!

relics.name: Neco Wig
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Dexterity and heal 3 HP for every curse in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Albino you [Nyaaaa] Idiot.

relics.name: Purifying Water
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card for each Curse in your deck.
relics.flavorText: What once held you back now pushes you forwards.

relics.name: Sandgun
relics.description: Upon pickup, add a Sandgun to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Sand is Overpowered.

relics.name: Serum W
relics.description:
When you gain Strength, double it.
When you would lose Strength, don't.
At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength.
If you have 250 or more Strength, your next attack will have Truest Power.
relics.flavorText: Wiz.atb(new YeetPlayerAction());

relics.name: Superball
relics.description: The first time you play a Power each turn, gain 1 Strength and raise this gain by 1.
relics.flavorText: Rumour has it collecting 7 of them will make all of your dreams bounce away!

relics.name: Vacant's Contract
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and bundlecore:Antifact.
relics.flavorText: AHAHAHAHAHA! FOOOOOOOOL! YOU BLEW IT! YOU TOTALLY SCREWED YOURSELF!

relics.name: Wave of the Iron
relics.description:
At the start of your turn draw 1 card and lose [E]. Skills give no Block.
Gain block equal to unblocked Attack damage.
Reduce your non-wave damage by 35%.
relics.flavorText: Oops! All iron waves!

relics.name: Fr-e-sh A-voca-do
relics.description: Upon pickup, add a Parasite to your deck. Gain 10 Max Hp and start each combat with 3 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: Worms not included?

relics.name: Friendship Scarf
relics.description: At the start of your turn, exhume and upgrade a card, then discard a random card.
relics.flavorText: With this scarf you feel compelled to make new friends.

relics.name: Mode Shift
relics.description:
Before the start of combat:
Lose 3 Strength and gain 2 Dexterity,
3 Metallicize and 4 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Defense mode activated.

relics.name: Prime Rod of Ice
relics.description: The first time each combat you play a non Power card that costs 3 or more, apply 1 bundlecore:Slow to EVERYONE.
relics.flavorText: Enhanced with a better stave from haglin, this frosty wand will make your enemies chill out! Artifact not included.

relics.name: Sticky Tarball
relics.description:
Before the start of combat, apply bundlecore:Slow to EVERYONE.
When you play a card, gain 1 Temporary Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Try not to put it in your deck.

keywords.name: Auty Albino
keywords.description: A relic inspired by albino, variety streamer and master of rigging rougelikes.

keywords.name: Fascinating Fleet
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Call of Fleet, creator of many popular mods such as Libriary of Ruina and Elena.

keywords.name: Furry Frost
keywords.description: A relic inspired FrostPrime_, an inclusive Slay the Spire twitch streamer.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Pitted Paparatto
keywords.description: A relic inspired by mod creator and twitch streamer Paparatto, creator of my favourite meme character, Avocado.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

mods.name: Bundle Of Content
mods.description:
A bundle full of content inspired by various mod and content creators! 
 Contains more than 30 relics!
